review:
All acceptance criteria verified:
- Format: containai-{repo}-{branch}, max 59 chars (reserve 4 for suffix)
- Repo = directory name (last path component)
- Branch from git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD
- Non-git: uses 'nogit'
- Detached HEAD: uses 7-char short SHA
- Sanitization: lowercase, / â†’ -, alphanumeric only, LC_ALL=C for locale safety
- Truncation preserves both repo and branch segments
- No docker calls in _containai_container_name
- Updated callers to use _cai_find_workspace_container for backward compatibility
- All 32 unit tests pass
- Shellcheck passes

<verdict>SHIP</verdict>
